description: This file defines the interface IEventHandler with pure virtual methods for handling container-related events such as start, stop, failure, and state change, within the WPEFramework namespace.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class defining callback methods for container event handling.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container starts, receiving a JSON object with data.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container stops, receiving a JSON object with data.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container fails, receiving a JSON object with data.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container's state changes, receiving a JSON object with data.
